class BtServiceVerifyResult

Detailed Description

The result of a service verify request executed by the Bluetooth Stack is an object of the class BtServiceVerifyResult. This class is a collection of zero or more service records.
One particular service record is represented by a BtSvrServiceRecord object that contains the description of that service record. In this context the expression "description" stands for the size of the service record and a pointer into the memory block of the corresponding BtServiceVerifyResult, where this service record starts.
There is no direct access to the memory block and it's size. Instead of this there are functions defined to get access to the single attributes like retrieving them via an index or an unique identifier. These functions do not copy any data. They only store a desciption of an attribute in the passed in BtSvrServiceAttribute. So the application programmer has to provide the memory for the storage of the description.

Member Function Documentation

UINT16 BtSvrServiceRecord::GetNumberOfServiceAttributes (   )  const
 

Get number of service attributes stored in this service record.

GetNumberOfServiceAttributes returns the number of attributes contained in this service record.

Returns:
An UINT16 containing the number of attributes that are stored in this service record.

BOOLEAN BtSvrServiceRecord::GetServiceAttributeAtIndex (  UINT16  index,
BtSvrServiceAttribute &  svr_service_attribute
)  const
 

Retrieve a service attribute from this service record.

GetServiceAttributeAtIndex returns the attribute at the position index of this service record. The index is zero based [0 .. numberOfAttributes - 1].

Parameters:
index An UINT16 containing the index of the BtSvrServicAttribute that should be retrieved.
svr_service_attribute A reference to a BtSvrServicAttribute where to store the information of the retrieved attribute.
Returns:
TRUE: The index is valid and a description of the attribute is stored in svr_service_attribute.
FALSE: The index is out of bounds. Do not use the content of svr_service_attribute because it is not valid.

BOOLEAN BtSvrServiceRecord::GetServiceAttributeById (  UINT16  id,
BtSvrServiceAttribute &  svr_service_attribute
)  const
 

Retrieve a service attribute from this service record.

GetServiceAttributeAtIndex returns the attribute with the identifier id of this service record.

Parameters:
id An UINT16 containing the identifier of the BtSvrServicAttribute that should be retrieved.
svr_service_attribute A reference to a BtSvrServicAttribute where to store the information of the retrieved attribute.
Returns:
TRUE: The identifier is valid and a description of the attribute is stored in svr_service_attribute.
FALSE: The identifier can not be found. Do not use the content of svr_service_attribute because it is not valid.

BOOLEAN BtSvrServiceRecord::IsValid (   )  const
 

Get validity of this service record.

IsValid returns the validity state of this service record.

Returns:
TRUE: This service record is valid. All other member functions return a result that can be used further.
FALSE: This service record is invalid. Do not call any further member functions because they allways will return an error.
